comments.body: These lines are ok for toolchain builds but will break the migration to the anaconda compilers.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +19,23 @@    - export CFLAGS="$CFLAGS -O3"  # [linux]
    - export LDFLAGS="-shared $LDFLAGS"  # [linux]
    - export LD=gcc  # [linux]
    - "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv"
